alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Louisa (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 4:01AM CDT until May 23 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at Keithsburg affecting Des Moines, Mercer, Louisa and Henderson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Keithsburg. * WHEN...Until Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water is over the campground and boat ramp in Keithsburg. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon and continue falling to 13.9 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued later this morning.
